review: This device delivers what is promised, and more. Its performance far outstrips the similar Chromecast device. Of course there are many differences. The Prime account connection makes a huge difference, with most content now available either on Amazon prime or Netflix which is also natively supported.A big plus for the Fire Stick is that it supports Miracast wireless linkage with smartphones and other devices that no longer have micro USB ports. Miracast works flawlessly, which was not true using two previous devices. This is the first good one. My only complaint is that Miracast must be enabled each time it is used, or at least that's the way it seems.
author: Spencer Day

review: We got the Amazon Fire TV box as a Christmas gift and loved it, so we got the Fire TV stick for our bedroom TV.  It's so easy to use and so many great things to watch with Prime.
